akn:section.akn:heading: Effect of changes in titles of appropriations

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1303. Effect of changes in titles of appropriations Expenditures for a particular object or purpose authorized by a law (and referred to in that law by the specific title previously used for the appropriation item in the appropriation law concerned) may be made from a corresponding appropriation item when the specific title is changed or eliminated from a later appropriation law. (Pub. L. 97–258, Sept. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 917.)
Historical and Revision Notes
